text: TELUS' (TU) planned investment is part of its commitment to invest $4.7 billion throughout British Columbia between 2017 and 2020.
title: TELUS to Launch Wireless Services in Ahousaht This December

text: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Nov.  12, 2019  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TELUS has invested more than $500,000 to build a new cell site in Ahousaht, a remote community off the west coast of Tofino on Vancouver Island, and is the first provider to bring high-speed wireless voice, text and Internet service to the community. Construction on the cell tower is nearing completion and TELUS anticipates the site will be live this December, providing residents and visitors in the area access to TELUS’ 4G LTE network, which has earned global recognition as the best network in Canada from third party organizations including OpenSignal, J.D. Power, Tutela, and Ookla.
title: TELUS invests more than $500,000 to bring wireless service to Ahousaht for the first time
